item.description:
Come and join us for the super fun Hampton Beach Seafood Festival. Lots of seafood to eat, nice beach, sky diving show, live band musics, and more. Check out the event's website:

http://hamptonbeachse...

If you are a seafood fanatic, you don't want to miss this, check out their menu:
http://hamptonbeachse...

Please indicate on your RSVP whether you can provide a ride or need a ride to Hampton, NH.

Where: Hampton Beach (I'll be at food court #1)
When: Sunday 9/12 @ Noon
Cost: $5 admission fee + cost of food on your own.

If you need to reach me on that day: 781-484-7913

Thanks,
Tran
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me at Food Tent # 1 at Noon time.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Hampton Beach Seafood Festival
